edu.ccsu.interfaces

Interface Device

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Fan, LightEnabledDevice, ScreenEnabledDevice
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GrovePiFan, LcdScreen, Led

    public interface Device
    Interface that specifies operations on Devices

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns name
      Device getNextDevice()
      Returns next device in CoR
      java.lang.String getPortNumber()
      Return this devices port number
      boolean isUseNext()
      Checks to see if device is allowed to use CoR
      void setName(java.lang.String name)
      Set the name

      Sets another devices to be used in Chain of Responsiblity.
      void setPortNumber(java.lang.String portNumber)
      Set this devices port number
      void setUseNext(boolean useNext)
      Set use next to true if you want to use an object's CoR.
      void turnOff()
      Can be used to turn off light capable devices
      void turnOn()
      Can be used to turn on light capable devices

    • Method Detail

      • setNextDevice

        void setNextDevice(Device nextDevice)
            throws IncompatibleDeviceError
        Sets another devices to be used in Chain of Responsiblity. If accessing current device fails and there is another device in the chain, device will try to use that next device to perform operations.
        Parameters:
        device -
        Throws:
        IncompatibleDeviceError

        Checks to see if device is allowed to use CoR

      • setUseNext

        void setUseNext(boolean useNext)
        Set use next to true if you want to use an object's CoR. Set to false if you don't want to use this object's CoR
        Parameters:
        useNext -
